name: Bamboo Dash (AR Runner)
description: Paxton Panda needs your help racing up his bamboo tree!  How far up the tree can you make it?  Take control of Paxton and jump, dip, and slide your way to the top of the leaderboards.  And for an added bonus, try Augmented Reality mode!  You can place your bamboo spiral anywhere and play in the real world!  Bamboo Dash is an endless runner so you can race your panda as long as you don't hit an obstacle!
